instruction: Think of a creative way to market a particular type of food.
output: Create a unique smoothie-tasting experience by offering interactive smoothie bars in various locations. Customers can choose their favorite fruits and vegetables to customize with various yogurt and juice bases, then they can watch their smoothie be made right in front of them. They can also personalize their smoothies with various toppings and learn about the health benefits of different ingredients. In addition, customers can share their own recipes with each other to gain even more smoothie inspiration.
